title: 87/205/EEC: Commission Decision of 11 March 1987 amending Decision 86/414/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Argentina approved for the purpose of importing meat products into the Community
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 11 March 1987
amending Decision 86/414/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Argentina approved for the purpose of importing meat products into the Community
(87/205/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 86/414/EEC is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 March 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 26, 31. 12. 1977, p. 85.
(2) OJ No L 362, 31. 12. 1985, p. 8.
(3) OJ No L 237, 23. 8. 1986, p. 36.
ANNEX
